description: From Middle English estival, from Old French estival, from Latin aestivalis.

adjectives.description: estival (comparative more estival, superlative most estival)

examples: […]  begin now to redden in abundance on the trees, and continue throughout the month, and part of the next; more particulars of which will be found in our catalogue of aestival fruits. The birds now begin to be very active in devouring the fruits, ...
